DOC.criteria: Patients schedule daysurgery laparoscopic cholecystectomy The patient able read comprehend Norwegian language The patient cognitive adequate able fill survey form The patient read sign patient information form Serious illness ( ASA 34 ) Pregnancy suspect pregnancy Breastfeeding woman Contraindications use NSAIDs Serious allergic reaction anaesthetic Allergy towards egg , soya peanut Known suspected Malignant Hyperthermia Porphyria Fatiguerelated diagnosis Recently receive adjuvant therapy ( chemotherapy , radiotherapy ) Severe chronic pain
